description:
net/url: better parsing of urls with @ symbol in authority

Fixes issue 3439

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=89a9ef95c8db ***

net/url: better parsing of urls with @ symbol in authority

Fixes issue 3439

R=r, rsc, dsymonds, n13m3y3r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6206090

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

Hello r@golang.org, rsc@golang.org, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

LGTM, thanks.

It's an invalid URL according to the RFC, but given that the most relevant browsers take it, the RFC seems out of date.

Hello r@golang.org, rsc@golang.org, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Please review my change.

Come to think of it, I'm separating tests with and without path/query. This fixes http://code.google.com/p/go/issues/detail?id=3439 and replaces http://codereview.appspot.com/5975050/

LGTM but wait for Gustavo

(since he worked on the code most recently)

subject: code review 6206090: net/url: better parsing of urls with @ symbol in authority
